name: Yet Another 'The West Wing' Quiz: The Third | Television | 15 Questions

questions.text: In the season premiere, which staff member was asleep at his desk when his pager went off?
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Ironically, housekeeping was running the vacuum cleaner right outside his open door and yet his pager woke him up.

questions.text: Who pinched Josh's ear to prove what effect Carpal Tunnel Syndrome had on the hand?
questions.explanation:
Donna.

	Leo's advice to Donna on how to avoid Carpal Tunnel Syndrome was to type slower so that's what Donna had all the secretaries do, including Margaret, Leo's secretary.

questions.text: What was the name of the White House counsel member who talked to each staff member during the MS scandal?
questions.explanation:
Oliver Babbish.

	Oliver Platt played Oliver Babbish. His character's funniest scene was when he smashed a broken tape recorder after Leo entered his office to talk to him about something private.

questions.text: Were there really two Indians in the lobby?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	CJ thought Josh was making a joke when he started his sentence out with 'So there are two Indians in a lobby.'

questions.text: What did Toby say Molly and Huck had that was so great?
questions.explanation:
Hats.

	This was one of Richard Schiff's best scenes. Toby was sitting in a room talking with the twins while coverage of Zoey's abduction played on the TV behind him.

questions.text: Who told Sam that he was going to run for President some day?
questions.explanation:
Jed.

	He then told him not to be afraid of it.

questions.text: Josh was told that he would always have a job as long as who did?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	Leo told Josh the infamous man in a hole story which Josh told to Sam in a later episode.

Bruno.

	Bruno uttered this in '20 Hours in America' when Sam told him he wrote the last part of the President's speech in the limo on the way to the dinner.

questions.text: As of the first season, what was Zoey's code name?
questions.explanation:
Book Bag.

	Gina said Zoey's code name into her mike after Charlie told her that he had bought movies to watch with Zoey for the rest of the night.

questions.text: What was Josh referring to when he said 'hurts like heartbreak'?
During big block of cheese day, who claimed to have fired more people before breakfast?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	Leo was upset because everyone was making fun of his big block of cheese day again.

questions.text: Who has been said to be the second hardest working person in the White House?
questions.explanation:
Charlie.

	Josh told a group of college students this during a lecture in 'Celestial Navigation'.

Will.

	This was Will's first face to face meeting with the President. He finally got out his title.

questions.text: Among Will's speechwriting interns, how many girls were named Lauren?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Will bought all the Laurens football jerseys so he could call out their number instead of their name.

questions.text: Who played the Speaker of the House?
questions.explanation:
John Goodman.

	Even though John Goodman played the Speaker of the House, each man on this list has played a role on 'The West Wing'. Annabeth Gish and Steven Eckholdt are going to be recurring roles on the fifth season as Jed and Abby's oldest daughter and son-in-law.
